meta.description: Cathay Pacific First and Business Class Lounge at Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Concourse G. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Cathay Pacific First and Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Follow signs to the entrance on Level 3.

location.description: Bang Phli, Samut Prakan, Bangkok, Thailand

lounge.description: The new Cathay Pacific First and Business Class Lounge in BKK provides a sense of tranquility and understated luxury. With a focus on well-being, all guests can enjoy a wide selection of food and beverages while relaxing in an environment designed with warm, natural materials.

reviews.content: Bathrooms inadequate. Every oneworld passenger in entire airport at this lounge. Too many passengers for such a tiny lounge.
They downgraded to Chandon as of April 2019, so no champagne.  Very crowded, quieter at the gate. Other lounge are very ordinary, so every oneworld member comes here. No more seating when we went.
Cathay standard. They serve Moet this time, even Rose by Moet. Love the noodle bar. Everything stylish and great. Can get crowded tho. The Japan is bigger but no champagne. Food excellent, too.
Nice lounge. Comfortable seating and the food at the noodle bar was excellent.
Excellent lounge. But just lacks the number of seats needed for such a busy lounge. Everything else was fresh and clean and a decent supply of food and drinks.

Recently upgraded, this brings the BKK lounge in line with others in the network. Super comfy, noodle bar, delicious lattes. Food and drinks available. Lounge slightly on small side, but minor quibble.
Small, but comfortable lounge, food are delicious, everything great.
Fabulous, recently renovated lounge mirrored after HKG flagship lounges. Limited food options but there is a noodle bar!
Great OW lounge. A smaller version of the great lounges in HKG. More relaxing than Japan Airlines Sakura lounge.
Excellent service and food offerings. No showers. Lounge seats with ottomans with great views. Cooked to order meals at Noodle Bar. Very modern and clean.
Nice lounge. Very comfortable and great latte.
Definitely your best choice for oneworld flyers. Reminiscent of The Pier; this is a great lounge with an array of comfortable seating options. They make Cathay Delight from scratch! Lacks showers.
Decent lounge with noodle bar doing cook to order food. Seating can be tight when busy but not a bad lounge. Lounge has showers if you need them.
This is a great lounge with fantastic food and staff and not busy when I visited.
Fantastic lounge with great food and service in a comfortable setting. Easily the pick of oneworld lounges at BKK!
Beautiful new lounge with noodle bar. Three main areas: noodle bar, pantry for snacks, bar lounge. Great service. Decor is similar to The Pier.
New lounge is excellent, follows similar style to new Cathay lounges. Good seating options, cook to order food and a full manned bar. Probably one of the best in Bangkok.
Excellent lounge. Great noodle bar.
Since my last review they have updated the wine list so much better options now.
A big improvement over the decent previous lounge, with excellent design and food/drinks! The seats at the far right when entering are very comfortable.
Food quality & service are very good though dim sum quality is a hit or miss.  There's a separate dining area. Like any lounge, it can be loud when crowded as it is smaller than the average lounge.
Best OW lounge in Bangkok, at least in terms of looks and comfort. Noodle bar is good. Otherwise lackluster food choices.
Extremely small, limited food options. Very crowded. But a decent sanctuary away from BKK. Warm and modern design with neat charging stations in the tables.
My first visit since the new lounge opened, it's outstanding! Much larger with a calm, warm & contemporary vibe and the additions of bathrooms, a bar & Noodle Bar make this the best OW option at BKK.
CX has recently refurbished this lounge to great effect. Medium-sized with a fantastic vibe - the new design philosophy works very well and the noodle bar is top notch. Highly recommended.
What a wonderful paradise! To unwind, lean back & relax .. Simplicity but GREAT!
Average size lounge, good food, and has restrooms now! Good location and clean facility. Comfortable if not a little loud.
Very very nice, very very clean!
The food selection isn't huge. Noodle Bar served a nice breakfast and ambience overall very good. Quiet place to relax prior to your flight.
Major upgrade June 2015. Noodle bar, drinks, seating and (yes finally bathrooms). Now the clear best in class oneworld lounge at BKK. Only miss is showers.
Quiet small lounge with lots of chairs but terrible selection of food and drink. Note - This is not a First lounge! Quiet place to relax though and grab a quick drink before a flight.
I went to both Priority Pass lounge and Cathay Pacific lounge to check both out before I decided to settle with CX lounge as it has a greater variety in terms of warm food and beverages.
Poor selection of food and drink. Was easy to find a seat though. Probate due to no reasonable food and drink!!
No bathroom?!?!?   The food selection/quality is pretty terrible - stay away.  The only saving grace is the nice beverage selection.  No bathroom?!?!?
Wi-fi is straightforward and easy to use which is an underrated quality with airport wi-fi. Amenities at the lounge are good but it is small so it can feel cramped.
